message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7,500.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but I'm hoping to get the product for a bit closer to $7,000. Would you be willing to go down to $7,200?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand you're looking to get the product for a bit closer to $7,000, but I'm still trying to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $7,350. It's the best I can do at this point.
